title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package' issue occurs when trying to copy a package in the project. The incorrect destination is shown as '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3'.
OB: When trying to copy a package, the destination shown is '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3' instead of the expected destination 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the correct destination 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' should be shown when copying a package.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project (e.g., project 'xxx').
2. Open the package viewer and select a package in project 'A'.
3. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
4. Check the destination shown in the copy package dialog.
